title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 331.5 - Spouse, parent, child of serviceman
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 331.5 - Spouse, parent, child of serviceman

State Regulations

The spouse, parent or child of a serviceman shall have the
right to vote by military ballot even though the serviceman does not apply for
a military ballot. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
331.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
